name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Red Cabbage
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on red cabbage. —Ed Levine...

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cabbage, onion, caraway seeds, vinegar and apples in a pot. Add a little bit of water.
Simmer, covered, for an hour and a half. Add more water, as needed, to prevent burning.
